channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: None of our Buzzers work, 23rd June
item.description:
Hi a couple of us have started to notice in the last 7 days that the buzzers to get us into the flat are no longer working. I went round to a couple neighbours tonight to ask if there’s had been working and they all said no for about 5-7 days now.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cazenove Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inside flats, 23rd June
item.description:

item.title: Fly tip reported as fixed, 23rd June
item.description:
So the fly tip which was reported outside 78 prestbury square on smarden groves green the funiture and toys were taken but the heaps of grass and bits of rubbish left!!! Surely it should all be dealt with and this needs to be addressed with notice'spit up to not fly tip!!!

item.title: Rubbish bags left on path again, 23rd June
item.description:
Two rubbish bags from street cleaning have been left on the path outside my house again. They have been there since the 16th (1 week ago). Please can they be collected.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitehall Road, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This block is the Ladies near the Mansion House. Early Monday afternoon 23/6/25, blocked toilets and no toilet paper in hardly any toilets. After a weekend where hundreds of people would've visited I would have expected cleaning services would've been straight onto making sure they were clean and tidy for the coming week. Come on Bexley you have a beautiful award winning park here, please do better for your thousands of visitors!!, 23rd June
item.description:
See above
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Park, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds in garages., 23rd June
item.description:
The set of council garages between 135 and 133 Witherston Way SE9 3JL need weeding . It’s getting difficult to drive through. The weeds are closing in on both sides. This has been reported before. You just say it’s been fixed. It definitely is not fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, William Barefoot Drive, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet
